about_the_game:
Purchase the BATIM Bundle at 20% off and receive Chapter 5 100% FREE on October 26th!!


The Angel must be punished.
Your dark journey into Joey Drew Studios continues with Chapter Four of "Bendy and the Ink Machine".

In this Chapter Four DLC, follow the fading trail of a stolen friend and survive the cartoon horrors that await you. The secrets of the studio are stepping into the light and it's time to face them.

Save the Wolf. Fear the Ride. End the Angel.

short_description: The exciting fourth chapter of "Bendy and the Ink Machine" has finally emerged. In this Chapter Four DLC, discover the secrets of angels, solve the riddles of the ink, and help Henry survive in this terrifying, forgotten cartoon studio.
